alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 26 at 4:15PM MDT until August 26 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL GARFIELD COUNTY... At 415 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated between 0.5 and 1.0 inches of rain have fallen from earlier thunderstorms across Death Hollow, Calf Creek, and the upper Escalante River basin. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks, streams, normally dry washes, and slot canyon areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Death Hollow Slot Canyon, Calf Creek, and the Upper Escalante River. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
